candidates.title: Upgrade MSRV to 1.61
candidates.body:
Thank you for helping out with embedded-graphics-simulator development! Please:

- [x] Check that you've added passing tests and documentation
- [x] Add an example where applicable
- [x] Add a `CHANGELOG.md` entry in the **Unreleased** section under the appropriate heading (**Added**, **Fixed**, etc) if your changes affect the **public API**
- [x] Run `rustfmt` on the project
- [x] Run `just build` (Linux/macOS only) and make sure it passes. If you use Windows, check that CI passes once you've opened the PR.

## PR description

candidates.title: Update to e-g 0.7.0
candidates.body: This PR updates the e-g dependency to 0.7.0.

candidates.title: Add features from png-target
candidates.body: This PR adds the features from `tools/png-target` in the e-g repo, like base64 and grayscale output, to the simulator PNG output. This reduces code duplication and adds support for `OutputSettings` to the PNG export.

candidates.title: Update to e-g beta.1
candidates.body:
This PR updates the e-g dependency to the latest beta.

@jamwaffles A simulator beta release, after this PR is merged, would be useful to update the other crates to the e-g beta.

candidates.title: Remove docs directory and update deps
candidates.body: This PR removes the `docs` directory, removes the `tinybmp` and `tinytga` dependencies and updates e-g to `0.7-alpha.3`.

candidates.title: Update dependencies with alphas
candidates.body:
Thank you for helping out with embedded-graphics-simulator development! Please:

- [x] Check that you've added passing tests and documentation
- [x] Add an example where applicable
- [x] Add a `CHANGELOG.md` entry in the **Unreleased** section under the appropriate heading (**Added**, **Fixed**, etc) if your changes affect the **public API**
- [x] Run `rustfmt` on the project
- [x] Run `just build` (Linux/macOS only) and make sure it passes. If you use Windows, check that CI passes once you've opened the PR.

## PR description

Tinytga and tinybmp have fresh alpha releases that point to e-g-core
which now makes the simulator compile (locally at least...)

This will allow a simulator release of 0.3.0-alpha.1 to be made which will close #12.

candidates.title: Fix missing 0.2.1 changes
candidates.body:

## PR description

Fixes the metadata changes. Not sure how this happened. There's another change in `release.toml` that's unrelated, but required for `cargo release` to do the changelog replacements properly.

Closes #2
